title: How to Decorate a Room for Summer

steps.headline: Take a bowl and pour some water in it.
steps.description: Add a dye of yellow color(optional) and put it on the stove for fifteen minutes.

steps.headline: Meanwhile, take white colored Pillowcase and some rubber bands.
Take some small sections of the pillow of one side and wrap them one after the other in rubber bands for some patterns.
Take the bowl and put the pillow slowly and carefully in the bowl.
Let it sit in the bowl for some times and then take it out.
steps.description: Go to the sink and put it in the running water so any extra color will be removed. then remove the rubber bands. Then wash it in the washing machine. Iron it.

steps.headline: Take some pom pom lace of pink or green color and with the help of the fabric glue paste it on the Pillowcase.
Enjoy!
steps.description: You can also make more of the same pattern or the other.

steps.headline: Take a giraffe of medium size.
steps.description: You can get it from toy store.

steps.headline: Take spray paint of golden or silver color.
steps.description: Put an old newspaper and put the giraffe over it and paint.Let it dry.

steps.headline: Take a plate and with the help of liquid glue attach the giraffe on the side of the plate.
steps.description: Add rings and enjoy!

steps.headline: Take an empty shoe box and take its upper portion/ cover.
steps.description: Wrap it with colorful sheet(bright colors).

steps.headline: Take colorful papers of the colors of your nail polishes.
steps.description: And punch them in the shape of heart. Now paste them on the top of the nail polishes.

steps.headline: And put them on the shoe holder.
steps.description: Enjoy!

steps.headline: Take an empty shoe box's lower portion.
steps.description: Wrap it with bright red or yellow color sheet.

steps.headline: Take empty tissue rolls and paint them.
steps.description: And put them in the box. Put pencil and colors and markers and other things in it. Enjoy!

steps.headline: Take an empty glass jar.
Take a beautiful patterned or simple paper and mark it at the size of the jar and cut it according to it.
steps.description: and paste it in the jar.Let it dry.

steps.headline: Now take some sugar, salt or filter beads and pour them in the jar.
steps.description: And put some eye liners, lip liners, mascara, blush on etc in it. And enjoy!

steps.headline: Take a glass jar and pour some water in it.
Take some beautiful shells and stones and put it in the jar.
Take some fresh flowers and also put them in the jar and enjoy!
Take a frame and make it empty.
Take some artificial flowers of bright colors and paste it on the frame's glass.
And close it from the back and hang it.
steps.description: Enjoy!

steps.headline: Take a shoe box and paint it with bright blue color.
With the help of paints write summer on the front for more designs.
steps.description: You can also paste laces on it.

steps.headline: And paste it with the help of nails or strong glue or tape on the walls.
Put magazines in it.
Enjoy!
Take an ordinary pencil.
Take patterned washi tape and wrap it all around your pencil.
steps.description: Enjoy!

steps.headline: Take a  piece of cardboard.
Take a bright parrot green colored fabric and paste it on the cardboard with the help of glue gun.
Take hooks and paste or attach them to the cardboard.
Hangs your key and enjoy!
Take a wooden rectangle and paint in any bright or dark color your want.
steps.description: Let it dry.

steps.headline: With the help of drill machine make holes on the bottom.
Take masking take and paste it on the wooden piece in the shape of Arrowhead(only boundaries don't fill inside).
Now take white paint and paint in the arrow.
Now remove the tape and with the help of a black permanent marker outline the Arrowhead for a sharp look.
In the holes screw some nails with beads or any other thing.
steps.description: Add the necklaces and keys etc.

steps.headline: Take a long foam roll and wrap it with washi tape, patterned paper or paints.
Take a small glass plate and paste it with the roll with the help of  glue.
steps.description: Let it dry.

steps.headline: Add some bracelets and bangles in the organizer.
Take an empty plastic cylindrical container and wrap it with some beautiful sheet.
Take some bright and different colors of hair ties and carefully wrap the container with the ties.
When finished, Put pencils, pens etc in it.
For more creativity, take the cover of the container and cover it with beautiful paper.
Then, take a glue and make a shape of heart and then sprinkle glitter on it.Let it dry.
Two in one!.
steps.description: It's a pencil holder and a tie holder also. Enjoy!

text: Tie Dye a Pillowcase Take a bowl and pour some water in it. Add a dye of yellow color(optional) and put it on the stove for fifteen minutes. Meanwhile, take white colored Pillowcase and some rubber bands.  Take some small sections of the pillow of one side and wrap them one after the other in rubber bands for some patterns.  Take the bowl and put the pillow slowly and carefully in the bowl.  Let it sit in the bowl for some times and then take it out. Go to the sink and put it in the running water so any extra color will be removed. then remove the rubber bands. Then wash it in the washing machine. Iron it. Take some pom pom lace of pink or green color and with the help of the fabric glue paste it on the Pillowcase.  Enjoy! You can also make more of the same pattern or the other. Giraffe Rings Holder Take a giraffe of medium size. You can get it from toy store. Take spray paint of golden or silver color. Put an old newspaper and put the giraffe over it and paint.Let it dry. Take a plate and with the help of liquid glue attach the giraffe on the side of the plate. Add rings and enjoy! Nail Polish Organizer Take an empty shoe box and take its upper portion/ cover. Wrap it with colorful sheet(bright colors). Take colorful papers of the colors of your nail polishes. And punch them in the shape of heart. Now paste them on the top of the nail polishes. And put them on the shoe holder. Enjoy! Pencil Holder Take an empty shoe box's lower portion. Wrap it with bright red or yellow color sheet. Take empty tissue rolls and paint them. And put them in the box. Put pencil and colors and markers and other things in it. Enjoy! Makeup Organizer Take an empty glass jar.  Take a beautiful patterned or simple paper and mark it at the size of the jar and cut it according to it. and paste it in the jar.Let it dry. Now take some sugar, salt or filter beads and pour them in the jar. And put some eye liners, lip liners, mascara, blush on etc in it. And enjoy! Shells and Flowers Jar Take a glass jar and pour some water in it.  Take some beautiful shells and stones and put it in the jar.  Take some fresh flowers and also put them in the jar and enjoy!  Flowers Frame Take a frame and make it empty.  Take some artificial flowers of bright colors and paste it on the frame's glass.  And close it from the back and hang it. Enjoy! Summer Magazines Holder Take a shoe box and paint it with bright blue color.  With the help of paints write summer on the front for more designs. You can also paste laces on it. And paste it with the help of nails or strong glue or tape on the walls.  Put magazines in it.  Enjoy!  Pencils Take an ordinary pencil.  Take patterned washi tape and wrap it all around your pencil. Enjoy! Keys Holder Take a  piece of cardboard.  Take a bright parrot green colored fabric and paste it on the cardboard with the help of glue gun.  Take hooks and paste or attach them to the cardboard.  Hangs your key and enjoy!  Summer Arrowhead jewelry organizer Take a wooden rectangle and paint in any bright or dark color your want. Let it dry. With the help of drill machine make holes on the bottom.  Take masking take and paste it on the wooden piece in the shape of Arrowhead(only boundaries don't fill inside).  Now take white paint and paint in the arrow.  Now remove the tape and with the help of a black permanent marker outline the Arrowhead for a sharp look.  In the holes screw some nails with beads or any other thing. Add the necklaces and keys etc. Bracelet Organizers Take a long foam roll and wrap it with washi tape, patterned paper or paints.  Take a small glass plate and paste it with the roll with the help of  glue. Let it dry. Add some bracelets and bangles in the organizer.  Pencils Holder Take an empty plastic cylindrical container and wrap it with some beautiful sheet.  Take some bright and different colors of hair ties and carefully wrap the container with the ties.  When finished, Put pencils, pens etc in it.  For more creativity, take the cover of the container and cover it with beautiful paper.  Then, take a glue and make a shape of heart and then sprinkle glitter on it.Let it dry.  Two in one!. It's a pencil holder and a tie holder also. Enjoy!
